name: vscode-statusbar-commands
description: This VSCode extension allows you to customize your VSCode status bar by adding quick-access commands with user-defined icons and tooltips. Easily configure and manage commands to streamline your workflow, all directly from your status bar.

statusbarCommands.commands.markdownDescription: List of commands to add to the status bar.

command.markdownDescription: Command ID of the VS Code command to run.

statusBarText.markdownDescription: The text to display in the status bar. Use the `$(<name>)` syntax to display icons from the [VS Code icon set](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/icons-in-labels#icon-listing).

tooltipText.markdownDescription: The text to display as a tooltip when hovering over the status bar item.

color.markdownDescription: The color of the status bar text (e.g., `#ff0000`, `red`). Accepts any valid CSS color value.

statusbarCommands.alignment.markdownDescription: Controls the alignment of status bar commands `Left` or `Right`.

statusbarCommands.showErrorWhenNoCommand.markdownDescription: Show an error message when no commands are defined.
